          <title>
            <string language="en">Conversion of temperatrues on the Kelvin, Fahrenheit and Celcius Scale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Konvertierung von temperatrues auf dem Kelvin, 
Fahrenheit und Celcius Skala</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Conversion des temperatrues sur le Kelvin, 
Fahrenheit et échelle de Celcius</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Conversão dos temperatrues no Kelvin, Fahrenheit
e escala de Celcius</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Conversione dei temperatrues sul Kelvin,

            <string language="x-mt-el">Μετατροπή των temperatrues στην κλίμακα Kelvin,

            <string language="x-mt-es">Conversión de temperatrues en el Kelvin, 
Fahrenheit y escala de Celcius</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A demonstration of temperature conversion between the different temperature scales.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una demostración de la conversión de la
